body_html:
I can reproduce this externally (Cloud TPU, TF 1.9), but when I tried to reproduce this internally (with dynamic_rnn) but I'm seeing identical loss and evaluation metrics for iterations_per_loop={1, 100}.

@saeta could there be a version issue here? Do we have a TF 1.10 version available we can test with?
body_text:
I can reproduce this externally (Cloud TPU, TF 1.9), but when I tried to reproduce this internally (with dynamic_rnn) but I'm seeing identical loss and evaluation metrics for iterations_per_loop={1, 100}.
@saeta could there be a version issue here?  Do we have a TF 1.10 version available we can test with?
body:
I can reproduce this externally (Cloud TPU, TF 1.9), but when I tried to reproduce this internally (with dynamic_rnn) but I'm seeing identical loss and evaluation metrics for iterations_per_loop={1, 100}.

@saeta could there be a version issue here?  Do we have a TF 1.10 version available we can test with?
